item.title: App Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy for Anesthesia Handbook
Effective Date: November 21, 2025

We at Anesthesia Handbook (“we,” “us,” or “our”) are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our mobile application (“the App”), which now includes integration with Google Sign-In, Firebase Authentication, and Firebase Analytics.

1. Information We Collect Link to heading

When you use the App, we (or our third-party service providers) may collect the following categories of information:

item.title: App Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy for Anesthesia Handbook Link to heading

Effective Date: October, 7th, 2025

Anesthesia Handbook (“we”, “us”, or “our”) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our mobile application.

1. No Data Collection Link to heading

We do not collect, store, or share any personal data from users. The app is designed to function entirely offline, and all calculations and inputs are processed locally on your device.
